de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.mapping

Interface IField


  • public interface IField
    Describes a java field of an IMapper

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Get a defined Annotation of the given class
      IColumnInfo getColumnInfo()
      Get the IColumnInfo which is connected to the current field
      java.lang.reflect.Constructor getConstructor(java.lang.Class<?>... parameters)
      Get the constructor with the given parameters
      java.lang.annotation.Annotation getEmbedRef()
      If for the current field an annotation Embedded or Referenced is defined, then it is returned here
      de.braintags.io.vertx.util.security.crypt.IEncoder getEncoder()
      If an IEncoder was defined by the annotation Encoder, it is returned here

      Get the underlaying Field

      Get the full name of the field

      java.lang.reflect.Type getSubType()
      If the java field is a list / array / map the the sub type is returned
      ITypeHandler getSubTypeHandler()
      If the java field is a list/array/map and the type of the members can be examined, then here the propriate ITypeHandler is returned
      java.lang.Class<?> getType()
      returns the type of the underlying java field
      ITypeHandler getTypeHandler()
      Get the fitting ITypeHandler which is responsible to change data into and from the propriate format
      java.util.List<IField> getTypeParameters()
      Get the list of defined type parameters of the current field

      Is the annotation defined?
      boolean isArray()
      Get the information whether the field defines an array
      boolean isCollection()
      Get the information whether the field defines a Collection
      boolean isIdField()
      Returns true, if the current field is a field annotated with Id

      Is this field a Map?
      boolean isSet()
      Is this field a Set?
      boolean isSingleValue()
      Is the field defining a single value?

      • getSubTypeHandler

        ITypeHandler getSubTypeHandler()
        If the java field is a list/array/map and the type of the members can be examined, then here the propriate ITypeHandler is returned
        Returns:
        the ITypeHandler to deal with the subtype, or NULL if subtype can't be read
